attributes.additional_details:
We propose to implement a system of deductions to student loans if said students attendance drops below 85%.

We want to create a higher education system that gives tutors full classrooms, increases pass rates, and gives students a taste of what to expect when working for an employer after they have finished their degree.

Students that attend all their lectures and tutors that teach them are both tired of having to suffer through the laziness of certain students.

Implementing punishments for low attendance will eradicate this problem.

Sign up to this petition to make a difference today!

It only takes One Signature.
